vscode-dapr.views.help.name: Help and Feedback
An ID for your application, used for service discovery.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.appMax: Controls the concurrency level of the application.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.appPor: The port your application is listening on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.appPro: Tells Dapr to use HTTP or gRPC to talk to the application.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.appSsl: Enable HTTPS when Dapr invokes the application.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.args.d: Additional arguments passed to the Dapr command.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.comman: The command and arguments used to start your application.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.config: The path to the Dapr configuration file.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.cwd.de: The directory in which to start Dapr.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.enable: Whether to enable pprof profiling via an HTTP endpoint.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.grpcPo: The gRPC port for Dapr to listen on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.httpPo: The HTTP port for Dapr to listen on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.placem: The host on which the placement service resides.
vscode-dapr.tasks.dapr.properties.profil: The port for the profile server to listen on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.appId: An ID for your application, used for service discovery.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.appMa: Controls the concurrency level when forwarding requests to user code.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.appPo: The port the application is listening on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.appSs: Sets the URI scheme of the app to https and attempts an SSL connection.
Additional arguments passed to the Dapr command.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.compo: Path for the components directory. (Standalone mode only.)
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.confi: Path to the configuration file, or the name of a configuration object.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.contr: Address for the Dapr control plane.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.enabl: Enables automatic mTLS for daprd to daprd communication channels.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.grpcP: The gRPC port for Dapr to listen on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.httpP: The HTTP port for Dapr to listen on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.inter: The gRPC port for the Dapr Internal API to listen on.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.kubeC: The absolute path to the kubeconfig file (default '/Users/<user>/.kube/config').
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.metri: The port for the metrics server.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.place: Address for the Dapr placement service.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.profi: The port for the profile server.
vscode-dapr.tasks.daprd.properties.sentr: Address for the Sentry CA service
An ID for your application, used for service discovery.
